subject: Re: nroff errors in 3.0.35a version of smb.conf.5
body:
Quoting Gerald (Jerry) Carter (jerry@samba.org):
> -----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----

> 
> Alexander Bokovoy wrote:
> 
> > I'll look at this today. I have one Feisty system which 
> > could show the problem easily...
> 
> Thanks alexander. If you need access to the build machine
> I'm using, let me know.


>From what I understood, Alexander fixed the issue in samba-docs
SVN. What version will include these changes? 3.0.26?
